alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 10:52PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Logan and northern Scott Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1052 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Chaffee to Echo to near Mansfield. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Waldron... Mansfield... Cardiff... Echo... Oliver... Barber... Cauthron... Winfield... Hon... Lucas... Liberty... Carolan... Grayson... Glendale in Logan County... Ione... Elm Park... Sugar Grove... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
